App Name: Tower of Fantasy

Brief:

Tower of Fantasy is an enthralling MMORPG set in the magnificent alien environment of Aida. This engaging game takes players on an adventure through a world full of wonders and dangers after humanity‚Äôs exodus from a depleted Earth. With a story centered around the mysterious and potent energy source "Omnium," you will have to navigate the consequences of Omnium radiation while facing off against the game's challenges.
